verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> [T'al-upon הַשְּׁמִינִ֗ית <S%H8067><s%> hash-she-mi-Nit, upon Sheminith מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. of David הוֹשִׁ֣יעָה <S%H3467><s%> ho-Shi-'ah Help יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גָמַ֣ר <S%H1584><s%> ga-Mar ceaseth חָסִ֑יד <S%H2623><s%> cha-Sid; for the godly man כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for פַ֥סּוּ <S%H6461><s%> Fas-su fail אֱ֝מוּנִ֗ים <S%H539><s%> 'e-mu-Nim, for the faithful מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei from among the children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam. of men

שָׁ֤וְא׀ <S%H7723><s%> shav vanity יְֽדַבְּרוּ֮ <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-be-Ru They speak אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for רֵ֫עֵ֥הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu with his neighbour שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> se-Fat lips חֲלָק֑וֹת <S%H2513><s%> cha-la-Kot; [with] flattering בְּלֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> be-Lev [and] with a double וָלֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> va-Lev heart יְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Be-ru. do they speak

יַכְרֵ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> yach-Ret shall cut off יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all שִׂפְתֵ֣י <S%H8193><s%> sif-Tei lips חֲלָק֑וֹת <S%H2513><s%> cha-la-Kot; all flattering לָ֝שׁ֗וֹן <S%H3956><s%> la-Shon, [and] the tongue מְדַבֶּ֥רֶת <S%H1696><s%> me-dab-Be-ret that speaketh גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lot. proud

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Who אָֽמְר֨וּ׀ <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Ru Who have said לִלְשֹׁנֵ֣נוּ <S%H3956><s%> lil-sho-Ne-nu With our tongue נַ֭גְבִּיר <S%H1396><s%> Nag-bir will we prevail שְׂפָתֵ֣ינוּ <S%H8193><s%> se-fa-Tei-nu our lips אִתָּ֑נוּ <S%H853><s%> 'it-Ta-nu; מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> mi who אָד֣וֹן <S%H113><s%> a-Don [are] our own who [is] lord לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

מִשֹּׁ֥ד <S%H7701><s%> mish-Shod For the oppression עֲנִיִּים֮ <S%H6041><s%> 'a-ni-Yim of the poor מֵאַנְקַ֪ת <S%H603><s%> me-'an-Kat for the sighing אֶבְי֫וֹנִ֥ים <S%H34><s%> ev-Yo-Nim of the needy עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah Now אָ֭קוּם <S%H6965><s%> 'A-kum now will I arise יֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> yo-Mar saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD אָשִׁ֥ית <S%H7896><s%> 'a-Shit I will set בְּ֝יֵ֗שַׁע <S%H3468><s%> be-Ye-sha', [him] in safety יָפִ֥יחַֽ <S%H6315><s%> ya-Fi-ach [from him that] puffeth לֽוֹ׃ lo.

אִֽמֲר֣וֹת <S%H565><s%> i-ma-Rot The words יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֲמָר֪וֹת <S%H565><s%> a-ma-Rot words טְהֹ֫ר֥וֹת <S%H2889><s%> te-Ho-Rot [are] pure כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef [as] silver צָ֭רוּף <S%H6884><s%> Tza-ruf tried בַּעֲלִ֣יל <S%H5948><s%> ba-'a-Lil in a furnace לָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> la-'A-retz; of earth מְ֝זֻקָּ֗ק <S%H2212><s%> me-zuk-Kak, purified שִׁבְעָתָֽיִם׃ <S%H7659><s%> shiv-'a-Ta-yim. seven times

אַתָּֽה־ <S%H859><s%> 'at-tah- O יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh them O LORD תִּשְׁמְרֵ֑ם <S%H8104><s%> tish-me-Rem; Thou shalt keep תִּצְּרֶ֓נּוּ׀ <S%H5341><s%> titz-tze-Ren-nu thou shalt preserve מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַדּ֖וֹר <S%H1755><s%> had-Dor generation ז֣וּ <S%H2098><s%> zu them from this לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam. for ever

סָבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv, on every side רְשָׁעִ֥ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im The wicked יִתְהַלָּכ֑וּן <S%H1980><s%> yit-hal-la-Chun; walk כְּרֻ֥ם <S%H7311><s%> ke-Rum are exalted זֻ֝לּ֗וּת <S%H2149><s%> zul-Lut, when the vilest לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei the sons אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam. of men
